name: Raw Ore
description: Unsorted chunks of rock threaded with metallic veins the seed of every other smithing material.

name: Iron Ingot
description: Reliable, weighty bars forged from smelted Raw Ore; cornerstone of entry-level arms.

name: Charstone
description: Dense, jet-black bricks that burn hot and clean, perfect for small apprentice forges.

name: Copper Bar
description: Reddish, conductive metal used for basic talismans and corrosion-resistant fittings.

name: Clear Quartz
description: Unblemished crystal shards that focus simple runes or serve as glass-grade filler.

name: Forge Flux
description: Pulverised limestone; purges slag and lets molten metal flow smoothly in the crucible.

name: Tin Ingot
description: Soft, silvery metal blended with iron or copper to lower melting points and add sheen.

name: Steel Ingot
description: Carbon-tempered iron delivering a sharper edge and tougher plate than its predecessor.

name: Forgebrick
description: Kiln-baked fuel blocks that ignite with a blue-white flame, sustaining higher forge temps.

name: Silver Bar
description: Luminous metal prized for anti-monster coatings and ornate weapon filigree.

name: Blood Garnet
description: Deep-red stones that channel heat runes and enhance bleeding-edge enchantments.

name: Flaredust
description: Volatile salt grains that flash-temper steel or power simple explosive charges.

name: Verdium
description: Green-tinged nickel alloy; stiffens fine blades and resists magical corrosion.

name: Damascus Billet
description: Folded-layer bars with swirling patterns balance, flexibility, and prestige in one.

name: Anthracite
description: Glassy black lumps that burn longer and hotter than common coals for deep forgework.

name: Sunblend
description: Radiant gold-silver alloy that amplifies spell-flow and buffs holy damage.

name: Azure Sapphire
description: Mana-conductive blue gems ideal for power-hungry rune slots.

name: Quicksilver
description: Alchemical mercury sealed in glass vials; softens metal lattices for enchant bonding.

name: Cobalt Core
description: Hard, blue-grey rods that raise weapon durability and boost lightning affinity.

name: Adamantite Bar
description: Near-unbreakable green-steel bars; legendary for shield faces and great-sword spines.

name: Voidfire
description: Pitch-black coal that burns with violet tongues, reaching other-worldly forge heats.

name: Mithril Bar
description: Feather-light silver-blue metal perfect for chainmail that moves like cloth.

name: Star Ruby
description: Crimson stones shot through with starlike asterisms; store immense thermal runes.

name: Philosophers Dust
description: Golden powder that transmutes base stats of gear during late-stage forging.

name: Wolfrite
description: Near-unmeltable tungsten alloy used to edge-bind masterwork blades for extreme sharpness.

name: Aetherium Ingot
description: Weightless, shimmering alloy channels pure energy and self-repairs minor nicks.

name: Dragon-Ember
description: Crystalline cinders from ancient drakes; a single shard can liquefy adamantite.

name: Orichalcum Bar
description: Mythic rose-gold metal rumoured to resist time itself and amplify aura-based skills.

name: Stardust Diamond
description: Perfectly clear stones flecked with cosmic motes; apex conduits for spell matrices.

name: Primordial Essence
description: Iridescent ether-sludge that binds souls to forged relics used sparingly by grandmasters.

name: Oblivion Steel
description: Pitch-black alloy that deadens sound and light, ideal for relic-grade assassin weapons.
